changelog:
- Updated LegionOS to 1.6
- Add Clear all notif like OOS
- Redesigned Brightness slider and qs background primary
- Remove manage notifications, center clear all
- Change QS padding
- Add various LS Cover art filters
- Fix Navigation Home button weired white tint
- Q Clock: Code style cleanups and Improvement
- FontService: Disable logspam
- Q Clock: Use Google Sans for typeface
- Q Clock: Reduce top margin, users want to see more notifications
- Q Clock: Animate change in time
- KeyguardSliceView: Align as per the Clock Style
- Q seekbar: Add extra tweaks
 SystemUI: Cleanup keyguard_status_view layout
